title: Elon Musk Has a Plan to Curb Tesla Store Car Vandals - But Thereâ€™s a Catch
description: If you've kept up with Tesla news, you've undoubtedly seen the wave of vandalism against both dealership and privately owned cars. Tesla has fought back against recent acts of vandalism toward its inventories by enabling Sentry Mode on all of its showroom vehicles. When active, Sentry mode uses a ...
